title: Eva Mendes
summary: Eva de la Caridad Méndez (/ˈmɛndɛz/; born March 5, 1974),[1] known professionally as Eva Mendes, is an American actress, model and businesswoman. Her acting career began in the late 1990s, with a series of roles in films such as Children of the Corn V: Fields of Terror (1998) and Urban Legends: Final Cut (2000).
